title: सूरज का सातवाँ घोड़ा
description: “Suraj ka Satwan Ghoda” is considered a unique experiment in story telling. A short novel, that may also be viewed as a set of connected mini-narratives, it can also be considered as one of the foremost instances of metafiction in twentieth century Hindi literature. This book talks about the encounter of narrator with 3 different women during his teenage, youth & adulthood.
author: Dharamvir Bharati
